Afang soup (ọ bụghị nke a na-aghọtahie dịka  ofe Okazi  ma ọ bụ ofe Ukazi, ofe si n'ụdị nri ndị Igbo), bụ akwụkwọ nri ofe nke sitere n'aka ndị Efik nke alaeze Efik na Cross River State na Ibibio  people nke Akwa Ibom na Southern Nigeria. Ọ bụ nri ndị Naijiria na akụkụ ụfọdụ nke Africa maara nke ọma

Ọ na-ewụ ewụ karịsịa n'etiti Ibibio na ndị Anang nke Akwa Ibom na Cross River steeti bụ ndị nabatara nri a dị ka akụkụ nke ọdịbendị ha. A na-enye ya n'ụlọ nakwa mgbe ụfọdụ n'ememe ndị dị ka agbamakwụkwọ, olili ozu, ememme wdg
karịsịa n'akụkụ ndịda Naịjirịa. Afang soup na-edozi ahụ nke ukwuu na ọnụahịa nke nkwadebe nwere ike ịgbanwe dabere na mkpa ezinụlọ
Ị̀he eji akwadebe ofe Afang gụnyere anụ ehi, azụ, mmanụ nkwụ, crayfish, ose, Shaki (ụgbụgbọ ehi), akwụkwọ mmiri, akwụkwọ okazi, yabasị, nnu periwinkle na ụfọdụ ihe ndị ọzọ.
